title: QUIZ: Places you've probably never heard of before
text:
YOU MIGHT ALSO LIKE {{item.title}}

Looking for a little bit of obscurity in your life? Thanks to the internet you can discover places that might otherwise have never crossed your radar, but now and then something will pop up that you've never heard of before - and perhaps a new destination to put onto your bucket list.

Play our quiz and see how strange the world can be.

CHECK OUT ANOTHER QUIZ: Which country should you visit next?





Find Your Escape by searching and comparing flight prices here. You can also sign-up for the Traveller24 Weekly Newsletter – Subscribe here. Or download the News24 App here, to receive expertly curated travel ideas and deals directly to your mobile.
description: Looking for a little obscurity in your life?
